parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description:
The domain name of the website.

>  A forwarding rule must be configured for the domain name. You can call the [DescribeDomains](~~91724~~) operation to query all domain names.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

>  This UNIX timestamp must indicate a point in time that is accurate to the minute.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The region in which your service is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn**: a region in the Chinese mainland.
*   **cn-hongkong**: a region outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

>  This UNIX timestamp must indicate a point in time that is accurate to the minute.
